idea: Provide nutritionally balanced staple food (Roti), with high shelf in semi cooked condition, through technologically enabled market driven social enterprise (thereby reduce dependency on philanthropic support) to solve hunger and nutritional challenges. The challenges among child (primary TG : 3 – 8 yrs ) and adults (secondary TG : 25 – 55 yrs) will be resolved by generating revenue in cities and hospitality sectors ( by targeting Ho-Re-Ca channel, food aggregators and e - commerce) and supporting the under privileged (in hunger districts)

idea:
At Brilliant Infotech, we develop innovative and creative products and services that provide total communication and information solutions. Among a plethora of services, web design and development, tailor made applications, ERPs, CRMs, e-commerce solutions, business-to-business applications, business-to-client applications, managed hosting and internet portal management are few that we offer. Satisfied clients around the globe bear testimony to the quality of our work. 


As a leader in technology exploring, Brilliant Infotech is committed to exporting quality software worldwide.


The general purpose of Brilliant Infotech is to develop and promote advanced information technologies for multi-user operation.


Brilliant Infotech's business philosophy is to assure the highest quality product, total client satisfaction, timely delivery of solutions and the best quality/price ratio found in the industry.
name: BRILLIANT INFOTECH

idea: It is a startup wherein, we build Cinemas in a Container used for transport of goods through Sea Route globally. The experience is same as the one in a Brick & Mortar counterpart.
